bugReport.title: Login button is not displayed correctly on the homepage in Chrome browser
bugReport.description: The 'Login' button is partially hidden and unresponsive on the homepage when using Chrome version 92.0.

stepsToReproduce.description: Go to the homepage of the website example.com

bugReport.expectedResult: The 'Login' button should be fully visible and clickable.
bugReport.actualResult: The 'Login' button is partially hidden and does not respond to clicks.

attachments.description: Screenshot showing the button display issue

comments.author: QA Team
comments.comment: Issue only occurs in Chrome; other browsers are unaffected.

bugReport.title: Search functionality returns incorrect results on the product page
bugReport.description:
When a user performs a search using the product search bar,incorrect or unrelated products are being 
                        displayed in the results. The issue occurs intermittently across various categories.

stepsToReproduce.description: Navigate to the product page on the website.
Enter a product name (e.g., 'Laptop') in the search bar.

bugReport.expectedResult:
The search results should display products related to the entered 
      query (e.g., showing different laptop models).
bugReport.actualResult:
The search results show unrelated products (e.g., mobile phones, accessories) 
      or return no results at all, even though matching products are available.

attachments.description: Screenshot showing unrelated products in the search results

comments.author: QA Team
comments.comment: Issue seems to occur when certain keywords are used. Needs investigation into search query logic.

bugReport.title: Checkout button becomes unresponsive after applying a discount code
bugReport.description:
When a valid discount code is applied at checkout, the 'Checkout' button becomes unresponsive and users cannot complete the purchase. 
                        The issue occurs consistently with multiple valid discount codes.

stepsToReproduce.description: Add any product to the cart.
Click the 'Apply' button and then attempt to click the 'Checkout' button.

bugReport.expectedResult: The discount code should be applied, and the 'Checkout' button should allow the user to proceed with the purchase.
bugReport.actualResult: The discount is applied, but the 'Checkout' button becomes unresponsive, preventing the user from proceeding.

attachments.description: Screenshot showing the unresponsive 'Checkout' button after applying the discount.

comments.author: QA Team
comments.comment: Issue is consistently reproducible with various discount codes across different browsers.

bugReport.title: Error message not displayed when mandatory fields are left blank on the registration form
bugReport.description: When submitting the registration form without filling in mandatory fields, no error message is displayed to the user, and the form submission fails silently.

stepsToReproduce.description: Observe that no error message appears, and the form is not submitted.

bugReport.expectedResult: An error message should appear, indicating that the mandatory fields must be filled out.
bugReport.actualResult: No error message is displayed, and the form submission fails without any feedback to the user.

attachments.description: Screenshot of the registration form after clicking 'Submit' without filling out mandatory fields.

comments.author: QA Team
comments.comment: The issue seems to be related to form validation logic on the client side.
